Text.Page:
Hesitation in battle means death. But who can help but hesitate when you draw your weapon and find your enemy is your former comrade, fallen to the darkness?

Some of us have loved ones fighting as one of the {@LinkCreature:32#12#Sihran templars}. They will not yield, and I dread putting my sword in my own brother's chest. But to you they are strangers...the enemy!

Will you release them from Kaidun's wicked grasp?

You did it? That's...good. Thank you.

It's never an easy thing, killing a good soldier.

I'd like to be alone now.
